titles.title: Trust the Lord- All Your Days

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Trust in the Lord and do good
and dwell in the land
and cultivate faithfulness
Be not envious of him who brings forth wicked schemes
For he will wither like the grass

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
And He will bring your righteousness
as the light of day
And your judgement as the noon
So wait patiently for Him and rest in the Lord all your days

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Delight yourself then in the Lord
And He will give to you,
the desires of your heart
Commit your way then unto Him, and trust also in Him,
And He will surely do it
